content.english:
Koala's Big Day.
 Story by Rebecca Johnson
content.chinese:
考拉的大日子 
 故事作者：丽贝卡-约翰逊

content.english: When the koalas heard the news,
content.chinese: 当考拉们听到这个消息的时候，

content.english: they came from everywhere.
content.chinese: 它们从四面八方赶来。

content.english: There were koalas with coats of light-coloured fur.
content.chinese: 有毛色浅的考拉。

content.english: There were koalas with coats of dark-coloured fur.
content.chinese: 有毛色深的考拉。

content.english: There were fast young koalas,
content.chinese: 有行动迅速的小考拉，

content.english: and wise, old koalas.
content.chinese: 也有充满智慧的老考拉。

content.english: They all stopped to listen as the news spread through the bush.
content.chinese: 当消息在丛林中传播开来的时候，它们都停下来倾听。

content.english: Baby koala heard the news, too.
content.chinese: 考拉宝宝也听到了这个消息。

content.english: ‘Can we go?’ he asked his mother.
content.chinese: ‘我们可以去吗？’它问妈妈。

content.english: ‘It’s a long way,’ said mother koala.
content.chinese: ‘路很远。’考拉妈妈说道，

content.english: ‘You would have to hang on very tightly.’
content.chinese: ‘你必须牢牢抓住我。’

content.english: Baby koala climbed onto his mother’s back and they set off to follow the others.
content.chinese: 考拉宝宝爬到妈妈的背上，它们跟着其他考拉出发了。

content.english: On the way, they met a lazy, old koala lounging about in the fork of a tree.
content.chinese: 路上，它们遇到了一只懒洋洋的老考拉倚在树杈上。

content.english: ‘Do you want to come with us?’ called baby koala.
content.chinese: ‘您想和我们一起去吗？’考拉宝宝喊道。

content.english: ‘Not today,’ said the old koala. ‘I’m too tired today.’
content.chinese: ‘今天不行，’老考拉说，‘我今天太累了。

content.english: ‘You go along and tell me all about it when you get back.’
content.chinese: ‘你们去吧，回来的时候告诉我都发生了什么。’

content.english: They followed the other koalas until they reached an enormous eucalypt. The tree was covered in fresh, green leaves.
content.chinese: 它们跟着其他考拉到达一棵巨大的桉树旁。树上长满了鲜嫩的绿叶。

content.english: Then they heard a shout...
content.chinese: 接着它们听到一声叫喊……

content.english: ‘Hoy! Come and join the fun.’
content.chinese: ‘嗨！一起来玩吧。’

content.english: There were koalas everywhere! It was a koala party.
content.chinese: 到处都是考拉！这是一个考拉聚会。

content.english: And there were enough fresh, green leaves for everyone. Baby koala picked some to take home to the big, old koala.
content.chinese: 每只考拉都有充足的、鲜嫩的绿叶。考拉宝宝摘了一些带回去给大块头的老考拉吃。

content.english: It was a very exciting day.
content.chinese: 这真是精彩的一天。
